title: mu3u
blurb: M3U/M3U8 playlist builder, editor, and viewer — import, clean, sort, and export your streams and tracks.
description: mu3u is a lightweight, browser-first toolkit for creating and maintaining audio/video playlists in M3U and M3U8 formats. Paste or import an existing playlist, tidy it up with de-duplication and sorting, validate entries, preview streams inline, and export clean lists — all locally in your browser with no server dependency. Ideal for radio/IPTV lists, podcast mirrors, long-form music sets, and personal streaming libraries.

versions.notes: Initial public pre-release: builder, import/export, validate, dedup, sort A–Z, inline preview.
